title: Genshi Shounen Ryuu (Ryu the Primitive Boy)
synopsis: When Ryuu is born his tribe tries to sacrifice him to a Tyrannosaurus named Shirano because of the color of his skin. He is however saved by a monkey who raises him as her own son. Meanwhile Ryuu's mother has left the tribe and is out on a quest to find Ryuu.
staff: [['Nitta, Yoshikata', ['Episode Director']], ['Kasai, Osamu', ['Episode Director']], ['Andou, Toyohiro', ['Script']], ['Mizuki, Ichirou', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
